parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>arma2-obsolete</title></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return the current task of the unit in the formation.
 
You can't use it in ArmA 2, it will always returns "NOTHING"</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[String]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''formationTask''' person </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> person: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]: (EXCLUDED, MOVE, COVER, LEADER) </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>_CurrentTask = FormationTask _person </inner><close></pre></close></ext>
</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setFormationTask]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
